sentences.english: Objective To discuss the techniques and methods of rodents killing in in-and-out small - scale ships.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨进出境小型船舶灭鼠的技术和方法。

sentences.english: Objective The conditions of Ceratopogonidae carried by entry international ocean ships were determined.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解入境国际航行船舶携带输入性蠓类的情况。

sentences.english: The large-scale engineering ships of this company have been used for many years and have been repaired for many times.
sentences.chinese: 由于公司的大型工程船舶船龄较长，修理次数较多。

sentences.english: The reward shall not exceed the value of the ship and other property salved .
sentences.chinese: 本条规定不影响船舶所有人对其他被救助方的追偿权。

sentences.english: This paper deals with the legal features of abandonment in ship insurance.
sentences.chinese: 本文阐述了船舶保险中委付的法律特征。

sentences.english: The cabin subdivision and the generating of cabin data are prerequisite for the calculation of ship stability.
sentences.chinese: 船舶分舱及舱室数据的生成是船舶稳性计算的前提。

sentences.english: The cabin subdivision and the generating of cabin data are prerequisite for the calculation of ship stability.

sentences.english: It often happens that the jetty of a wharf is struck by a ship.
sentences.chinese: 码头引桥受船舶撞击的事故屡有发生。

sentences.english: The first chapter is focused on the basic issues relating to ship managers.
sentences.chinese: 第一章论述有关船舶管理人的一些基本问题。

sentences.english: The picture shows Customs officers making supervision on the ship entering into territory.
sentences.chinese: 图为关员对进境船舶实施监管。

sentences.english: A port is the place where ships come in and out.
sentences.chinese: 船舶进出的港口是海上运输的辐辏之地。

sentences.english: It is said that all ships coming from abroad should be performed quarantine.
sentences.chinese: 据说对所有国外来的船舶都要进行检疫。

sentences.english: Marine insurance policy includes "both to blame" collision clauses and fully covers the shipment.
sentences.chinese: 海运保险单包括负责船舶互撞条款和全部货载。

sentences.english: A brief description is made about all-freeze LPG carrier"s cargo handling system."
sentences.chinese: 对LPG船舶货物系统作了简要的叙述。

sentences.english: This paper reviews relative issues on vessel's reconstruction in salvage engineering.
sentences.chinese: 文章探讨了救捞工程船舶改造方面的问题。

sentences.english: Vessel sailed from loading port to yingkou port directly . without discharging any cargo on the voyage.
sentences.chinese: 船舶由装货港直达营口港，中途未卸货。
